text: the people watching paused to take him
what they've just seen and then realized
that they might be in danger the wall of
earth engulfed an industrial park on the
outskirts of Shenzhen once a fishing
village now a symbol of China's economic
boom about 20 buildings were destroyed
including two dormitories for local
workers the authorities had some warning
because they had time to evacuate
hundreds of people but some might not
have escaped
afterwards search teams come the ruble
on earth looking for anyone who might be
trapped underneath media reports suggest
the landslide was caused by a collapsing
earth which had been dug up during
construction work over the past two
years but explanations will come later
for the moment the focus is on the
search for those still missing
Michel Bristow BBC News
